text: "Tangled Up in Blue" is a 1975 song by Bob Dylan. It is the opening track to his 15th studio album Blood on the Tracks. It went to number 31 in the United States after being released as a single. It was produced by David Zimmermann, Dylan's brother. It has appeared on numerous albums since its release. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Tangled Up in Blue
